title: Going To Silver Star Guild (Part 1)
body:
Going To Silver Star Guild (Part 1)

Since it was morning, many people who were outside noticed the giant vortex that was forming above the hotel.

In just a few seconds, the mana vortex's diameter increased to eight kilometres.

Most of the people were shocked to see such a large mana vortex because even when someone's core evolves to S rank, the mana vortex's size will not exceed five kilometres.

A large amount of mana came down from the mana vortex like a tidal wave and Evan's body started to absorb it.

Rumble!

The foundation of the hotel shook because of the large amount of mana that was coming down from the vortex.

Evan's body turned into a black hole and all the mana that was coming from the vortex was absorbed by his prime core.

While in the middle of advancing, Evan suddenly thought about something and a deep frown appeared on his face.
